mapper.select: SELECT lcidCode , hospitalId , patientId , lcidName , lcidpGroup , lcidtResult , lcidinOut , lcidArea , pDoctor , lcidoDate , lciddDate , lcidrDate , adminId , lcidDate FROM junyumh

SELECT lcidCode , hospitalId , patientId , lcidName , lcidpGroup , lcidtResult , lcidinOut , lcidArea , pDoctor , lcidoDate , lciddDate , lcidrDate , adminId , lcidDate FROM junyumh where patientId = #{patientId}
mapper.insert: REPLACE INTO junyum SELECT lcidCode , hospitalId , patientId , lcidName , lcidpGroup , lcidtResult , lcidinOut , lcidArea , pDoctor , lcidoDate , lciddDate , lcidrDate , adminId , lcidDate FROM junyumh WHERE patientId = #{patientId}
mapper.select: SELECT lcidCode , hospitalId , patientId , lcidName , lcidpGroup , lcidtResult , lcidinOut , lcidArea , pDoctor , lcidoDate , lciddDate , lcidrDate , adminId , lcidDate FROM junyum
